replies.body: Can y'all post these videos on YouTube please, its kind of annoying having to go to the news page. But I love this series :D
rito listen to himm
I'm glad they brought Summoner Showcase back, really cool to see. But seeing that they mention "Gaming Curios" in a good way? Yeah...they just lost all credibility.

Hey Sogreth, 

The aim of the show isn't to only show off the "best" work, but work we find intersteing and celebrate the passion behind it. Making an essay like that takes a lot of time, energy and effort. I also learned a lot while watching the video, even though I have been playing since before Thresh was released. Hence the decision to share it! 

I know not everything will be everyone's cup of tea, but being constructive in your feedback is always better for an artist. It helps them grow, and learn to improve. 

Thanks for watching this episode. :)
Hey guys it's me Jeremy
*cringe*
He just did a reboot of his content creation, I actually like his videos now because they aren't what they used to be.
P-please stop yelling at me.
I'm not trying to... I'm just excited about the art! (and I'm naturally a pretty loud person)

Perhaps u'd be excited about this?

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/AbjWvG3X-ceramic-bard-horn-flute-sculpture

I made this a while back, but it didn't garner much attention. I have really admired bard's horn design for a long time, but when I looked up cosplays to see what had been created none of them really hit the mark to me, I took advantage of 2 art classes to make this (u don't want to see the first one, its sooo bad.)

its not that.  i have seen this before when lolking did summoner showcase revival and Kat Andrusco began... she too was very forceful in the way she did the show.  After a few months she went into a smoother stride.  Hope the time and experience will make you a smoother presenter.  good luck.
Keep up the excitement. Great showcase.
With a darker shade of purple and shirt, you could have had a dark star theme going on. Cool hair tho!
Ooh that's a smart idea!  :)
Please bring back All Chat. It was so good and creative, and the personalities of Xell, Dash, Roselight, and everyone were so good.
b-b-but reddit said it was bad >:(
please put this on youtube its so annoying to have to go to facebook for this
I enjoy these a lot. Giving the fans some lovin' is never a bad idea. Short and sweet (unlike All Chat). Good going Mr. Rito.
I'll watch when you bring nika back...

She quit. It's not that they got rid of her. It was her choice to leave. But I do kinda agree, the show was much better with Nika. The host now isn't bad at all, I'm not trying to diss her, but, Nika was just awesome. Also, I mentioned it before but, they used that "Gaming Curios" guy in a good way, so they have lost all credibility, and I probably won't continue to watch.
Did she... just call us nerds......{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{item:3083}}
You still have some work to do on your showmanship but, if you do I think you have the potential to make a real skill out of it.
I miss Nikasaur, bring her back!
Feels old when you remember the 1st Summoner Showcase.
{{champion:42}} yt
I like what you're doing here, but frankly I preferred All Chat. Keep it up though, I'm always willing to be proven wrong :)
Needs moar Karthus :P

"Hey guys it's me Jeremy" 

*cringe*
TBF - I was subscribed to him for a long time till the *change*
